name: deliberated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
deliberate
to think or talk seriously and carefully about something: The jury took five days to deliberate on the case. The committee has deliberated the question at great length. [ + question word ] He's deliberating whether or not to accept the new job that he's been offered.
